eventDetails: These events are suitable for those who already have a regular meditation practice and want to continue to do so in a supportive environment with other meditators. There is no requirement to book in advance, just turn up, or log in. For online sits, please click the link below a few minutes before each sit. Join the morning meditations each day using Zoom (password if required is dropinmed ). On a donation basis. No need to book, just drop in if you know how to meditate.
eventName: Drop In Morning Meditation (In person and Online)

eventDetails:
Join us for an enlightening evening of meditation focused on spiritual healing and self-realization. During this session, you'll embark on a journey to discover the power of holistic health and wellness through the practice of mindfulness and meditation. Our experienced facilitators Michael Bernard and Dr. Francis will guide you through various techniques designed to enhance your mental wellness, ignite spiritual growth, and awaken your true potential. When practiced regularly in the life can have a profound effect on your mental peace, helping to release stress, embrace self-help, and experience a deep connection with your spirituality. This event is suitable for both beginners seeking an introduction to meditation and seasoned practitioners looking to deepen awareness. Don't miss this opportunity to nourish your mind, body, and soul. Join us for a transformative evening that will leave you with a renewed sense of purpose and a path towards self-improvement and self-realization. Love and light,
Mata Ji *** Divine Representation and Teacher
SHREE MAHARANI JI Facilitators
MICHAEL BERNARD COX
& DR FRANCIS VALLOOR *** Date/Time: Monday 8th April, 2024. From 7.30 ‚Äì 8.30pm Venue: The Sanctuary, Stanhope Street, Dublin 7. -> Map/Directions: https://maps.app.goo.gl/sw3CzNEha2LKLX4SA Recommended donation: ‚Ç¨10 Contact: via private message or comments section through the Maha Ji Yoga Meditation Meetup page
eventName: Maha Ji Yoga Meditation at The Sanctuary

groupName: Yoga with Reiki - Karina Rodrigues Connection
eventDetails:
‚ú®My yoga classes are gentle movements with a focus on breathing and bringing a connection with the body differently.
The classes will have 90 minutes, so we can enter a little deeper into ourselves on the mat and bring outside our vitality and connection. ‚ú®In each class, we'll embrace a different perspective of ourselves and bring it to life.
My classes are designed to give you the tools to feel self-empowered and align to the feelings of peace, positivity, and self-empowerment, to listen to your body, to respect your body, and to embody different feelings that you have. ‚ú®What my classes will bring to you? Connection, healing, happiness, positivity, and well-being, removing feelings of anger, stress, fear, negativity, and frustration so you open space in your life for confidence, self-esteem, self-worth, and self-love, you are important.
We'll start with breathing techniques, Reiki, Asanas, mantras, meditation, and then Shavasana and end oracle card to guide you with some message. What to bring:
‚ú®Open heart
‚ú®yoga mat
‚ú® water bottle
‚ú® wear comfortable clothes
‚ú® Notebook if have any insight or ideas The exchange:
First-class ‚Ç¨15
4 classes are ‚Ç¨65
Drop in ‚Ç¨18 To Book your class or individual session you must go on this for the payment link.
https://app.ubindi.com/Karina.Rodrigues.da.Silva
Or pay by REvolut @karinaconnection (but you have to message me so I can know you are making the payment through Revolut) Any questions:
https://wa.me/message/WJ777TLLCNDRC1 BENEFITS: Breathing techniques: Improves blood circulation, helps with anger, boosts immunity, helps manage Symptoms of Depression and Anxiety, reduces tension to Help With Headaches, and calms our emotions. Reiki: Increases energy, Promotes relaxation, focus, and clarity of mind, Enhances self-confidence, Improves grieving, accelerates the healing process after injuries and surgery, and helps to maintain health and well-being. Asanas: Practising yoga helps control an individual‚Äôs mind, body, and soul. It brings together physical and mental disciplines to achieve a peaceful body and mind; it helps manage stress and anxiety and keeps you relaxed. Yoga also helps in increasing flexibility, muscle strength, and body tone. It improves respiration, energy, and vitality. Practicing asanas might seem like just stretching, but it can do much more for your body from the way you feel, look, and move.
Yoga guides you to a deep connection with your inner self, body, and the divine. Mantras: Mantra is a Sanskrit term, with ‚Äúman‚Äù meaning ‚Äúmind‚Äù and ‚Äútra‚Äù meaning ‚Äúrelease.‚Äù
Think of a mantra ‚Äî a word or phrase you repeat during meditation ‚Äî as a tool to help release your mind. It can make a lot of difference, especially if you have trouble concentrating or getting in the right frame of mind. Meditation: Gaining a new perspective on stressful situations, building skills to manage your stress, increasing self-awareness, focusing on the present, reducing negative emotions, increasing imagination and creativity, and increasing patience and tolerance. Shavasana: Calms the central nervous system, aiding the digestive and immune systems.Calms the mind and reduces stress and anxiety, helps lower blood pressure, and promotes spiritual awakening and awareness of higher consciousness. ‚ú®Learn how your body is communicating with you all the time, you just need to be willing to start this new healing journey!
‚ú®Be responsible for your BODY, for your LIFE.
‚ú®Learn to listen to yourself, to respect yourself, to forgive and thus become emotionally stronger and no longer feel pain.
‚ú® Come and talk to me, I'm with my heart open to listen to you, let's find the best way to navigate your body's memories, pain, or emotions, walking together to discover the emotional and affective cause, strengthening you're throughout the process of connecting with your true self. ‚ô•Ô∏è Love and gratitude ‚ô•Ô∏è
Karina Rodrigues Connection
Contact: 089.9692341
Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/p/Cj1Idf3rdgm/?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=

Would you like to reduce stress?
Increase happiness?
Enhance your focus?
Achieve calmness? We can show you techniques you can do with an immediate benefit that takes just a few minutes. We call it Twin Hearts Meditation with an added bonus of self-healing!
Give it a try yourself! Event followed by optional Pranic Healing stress relief treatments (10 mins) Public event open to all 18 yrs +
Cost: Suggested 10 donation to charity RSVP - discoverpranichealing@gmail
eventName: Twin Hearts Meditation and Healing Clinic Rialto (monthly event)

groupName: Pranic Healing in the Community Wexford
eventDetails:
Do you need some time out? To relax and unwind? Join in the Twin Hearts Meditation to help relax you, make your mind calm, feel happier. You might have been interested in doing Meditation because you want to achieve calmness and stillness, or to have a healthier body, purer mind, or maybe to attract positive things, people and increase your good luck. Your intention might even be to become happier, more intelligent, to develop intuition or achieve illumination. It can also be more selfless towards creating a better world for all. Whatever your intention, maybe there is a simple yet effective technique that can take you there. We call it the Meditation on Twin Hearts‚Ä¶ Meditation on Twin Hearts is one of the very advanced spiritual techniques, which was given to selected disciples in the past, and now made public through the valuable efforts of GrandMaster Choa Kok Sui. Its secret relies on activating the human energy centers, the Heart and the Crown without which illumination is not possible. There are many ways of activating the heart and crown chakras, such as Hatha yoga, yogic breathing techniques, chanting mantras and visualization techniques. All of these techniques are effective but not fast enough, while one of the most effective and fastest ways still remains the Meditation on Twin Hearts. BENEFITS OF
Meditation on Twins Hearts
Reduced stress, anxiety and depression
It even disintegrates the unwanted emotions and thought-forms within your chakras and aura. You should know that most of these are not yours. Sharper mind and greater happiness
Once the unwanted thought forms and emotions are out of your system, your mind becomes clear and your emotions more refined. Improve your relationships
As you bless the entire earth with loving-kindness, you will be filled with love energy. This love brings harmony to your relationships. Improved health
Once the divine energy flows through you, it naturally flushes the used up and unwanted energies within your system; so after the meditation, you become a fresher you. Become a divine channel
The meditation creates an opportunity for you to become a channel to bless every person, every being on earth with a better life. Increase good luck
Once you make yourself available to serve, you create lots of good karma that shows itself in life as good luck.

Do you suffer from anorexia, bulimia, obesity, binge eating, or undereating? Are you sick of trying to control your eating? Is your obsession with food taking over your life? Addictive Eaters Anonymous (AEA) is a worldwide Twelve Step fellowship based on Alcoholics Anonymous. AEA members have found recovery from binge eating, anorexia, bulimia, other forms of addictive eating and compulsive exercise. Through working the Twelve Steps of AEA, members find peace of mind and the ability to live a meaningful and productive life. Wherever you are, whatever your problem with food, AEA can help. AEA meeting every Monday evening 7.30pm - 8.30pm in Dublin. There are no fees and everyone is welcome. Please contact us for meeting venue details.
Phone: +353 1 554 9725
Email: contact@aeairl.org
Website: www.addictiveeatersanonymous.org Please visit our website for weekly online meetings.

eventDetails: This is a gentle Hatha yoga practice helping us to connect more fully with our bodies while nourishing our spirit and calming the chatter of our minds. Our yoga practice takes on a more spiritual focus, encoroporating the chakra system and creating a space for students to connect with their true selves. It is suitable for all seekers regardless of experience or beliefs. Come try it out! Everyone welcome. Om Shanti! In person places are limited so booking is essential by calling Jane on 086-3043453. OR you can join us online and email mellettj@gmail.com for online details. Class is available in person (10 euros) or online (7 euros).

We're offering Free Trial Classes to anyone interested in joining the Bray Movement School. A school gives us the opportunity to come together as a collective with the dual objective of working on the material and working on ourselves. Through the group we give ourselves a chance to change, transform and most notably, provide a space to awaken and become conscious. A movement practice will provide the platform and broad range of material to contend with. In taking part in a movement school like this I‚Äôll aim to teach material that will help you foster a lifelong movement practice that is independent in its own way and truly unique to you as an individual. We come together as a group to share that unique perspective and elevate our own understanding of movement as part of a community. The school will follow a curriculum based approach in exposing students to what I feel are fundamental practices (listed below) that relate to the field of movement. The teachings will be delivered in an organised, modular and process-based approach in order to present these various systems as a coherent body of knowledge. Website: ronanlewins.ie/movement-school-free-trial
locationInfo: Bray Bowl, Quinsborough Rd, Bray, Wicklow, al
eventName: Free Trial Class - Bray Movement School

eventDetails: These are our regular Monday evening electronics nights. Everyone from absolute beginner to experienced is welcome. These evenings are not classes or tutorials, rather a very friendly informal evening. We have a wide range of people who come. Some are absolute beginners who do not even work or study electronics, but are interested to know more. Others have something that they are already working on. We almost always have some first time visitors and we always give them a tour of the space. Come in with your Pi, Arduino, or whatever you have. Bring your laptop. Maybe you want to make something, solder, breadboard or use our electronic gear. Maybe you have some vague ideas and just want to get started. Or maybe you‚Äôre just curious‚Ä¶‚Ä¶if so, it‚Äôs fine to come along and just see what others are doing. If you would like to get even more involved and have the full use of our space, we would be delighted to have you as a full member. Membership brings many benefits. We are located behind Mr Price and the Bright Lights store on Kylemore Road. We have lots of free parking available.

eventDetails: Are you looking to develop or enhance your yoga practice and improve your health and well-being? Then you are going to love our Fuego Flow Yoga classes! They are the perfect mix of balance & flexibility, strength & relaxation. Whether you are new to yoga or have been practicing for years, you will find something to suit your level and interest. Expect a dynamic yoga class, a fusion of Hatha, Vinyasa, and Power yoga, offering an energizing and mindful experience that leaves you feeling invigorated. This class focuses on building strength, increasing flexibility, fostering mind-body connection, and cultivating mindfulness while providing a satisfying challenge for your body. Suitable for all levels Theme of this class: Balance and Bone Health This session emphasizes balance poses that enhance bone health and stability. By improving balance, you reduce the risk of falls and fractures. Additionally, these poses engage weight-bearing bones, which can help prevent conditions like osteoporosis. Join us every Tuesday at 7pm at The Carmelite Community Centre, 56 Aungier St, Dublin 2, D02 T258 Yoga instructor for this session: Hanna Book your class directly on our website fuegoflow.ie We offer a variety of pricing options. You can get a single class, a pack of 5/10 or one of the unlimited plans. We are also currently offering all you can eat Zumba & Yoga taster month for 50% off for ‚Ç¨74.5. You can select the "Unlimited 1 month Zumba and Yoga pass" HERE. Use the code TASTER-MONTH during checkout to apply the discount. Please BYOM (Bring Your Own Mat) and be sure to arrive 10 min before the class so you have time to get set up. üßòWe can‚Äôt wait to see you on the mat üßò
eventName: Yoga Class with Fuego Flow (theme: Balance and Bone Health)

groupName: Irish Social Dancing: Set Dancing and Sean N√≥s
eventDetails:
Hello all! My name is Louise O Connor. Im a fiddle player and dancer from County Clare and I love teaching the Irish dances I grew up doing back home.
You're very welcome to join us for social dancing in the Backroom of The Cobblestone starting again January 15th at 7.15pm. It is very relaxed and informal and always great fun. The dancers that have come so far have all gotten to know each other which is lovely. They have been locals as well as people coming from different countries. Booking link is here: www.louise.ie/beginners Ill be teaching set dancing which is an traditional Irish social dance. You do not need a partner to attend and all levels of dancers are welcome.
We will dance a different set each night. If you are already familiar with the sets you can still enjoy dancing through the sets. We will learn the Plain, Ballyvourney Jig, Kilfenora amongst others. You can of course carry on the night in The Cobblestone Pub after where there is always brilliant live music playing.
I will also be organising some live music C√©il√≠ or party events. The next one will be on January 28th in the Grand Social. All the info is here: www.louise.ie/areyadancin
We'll have a live band and Irish College style dances instructed in both English and Irish
eventName: Beginners Irish Social Dancing in The Cobblestone Pub: Set Dancing

eventDetails: Indulge in calming teas and snacks while engaging in lively conversations with other artists. As you mingle, exchange experiences and wisdom, fostering a supportive atmosphere aimed at unleashing boundless creativity. This is an opportunity for you to work on your own art piece as well as being surrounded by like minded artists. While we provide the essentials such as paper and brushes, we encourage you to bring your own art supplies to enhance your creative journey. Embrace the opportunity to personalize your artistic process and delve deeper into your unique expression. Tickets sold HERE to secure your spot or pay at the door Through curated activities and meaningful discussions, you'll delve into the heart of your creative challenges. By sharing insights and strategies with your peers, you'll uncover innovative ways to overcome artistic hurdles. Join us in breaking through the barriers of creative block and nurturing a vibrant community of artists.

groupName: Irish Social Dancing: Set Dancing and Sean N√≥s
eventDetails:
Hello all! My name is Louise O Connor. Im a fiddle player and dancer from County Clare and I love teaching the Irish dances I grew up doing back home.
You're very welcome to join us for social dancing in the Backroom of The Cobblestone starting again January 15th at 7.15pm. It is very relaxed and informal and always great fun. The dancers that have come so far have all gotten to know each other which is lovely. They have been locals as well as people coming from different countries. Booking link is here: www.louise.ie/beginners Ill be teaching set dancing which is an traditional Irish social dance. You do not need a partner to attend and all levels of dancers are welcome.
We will dance a different set each night. If you are already familiar with the sets you can still enjoy dancing through the sets. We will learn the Plain, Ballyvourney Jig, Kilfenora amongst others. You can of course carry on the night in The Cobblestone Pub after where there is always brilliant live music playing.
I will also be organising some live music C√©il√≠ or party events. The next one will be on January 28th in the Grand Social. All the info is here: www.louise.ie/areyadancin
We'll have a live band and Irish College style dances instructed in both English and Irish
eventName: Beginners Irish Social Dancing in The Cobblestone Pub: Set Dancing

groupName: Explore the cities of UK and Ireland playing and learning
eventDetails:
Have fun alone or make your team and start walking through Dublin's best attractions solving riddles! Learn interesting things about the city and the attractions! Play an app led city game ! Take your companion or meet new teammates and test your co operation skills! Book your game on https://worldcitytrail.com/product/dublin-scavenger-hunt !
Cost: 10 EUR (50%) off, only for this group's members, apply coupon: MTP50 in your cart page! Have fun !
eventName: Dublin scavenger hunt - Explore the city playing and learning!

eventDetails:
You'll meet your local guide at the meeting point a little before 11AM and show your booking. Then we'll commence a fascinating walking tour through the streets, sights, and sounds of Dublin old and new. You'll get an unrivalled insight to the history and culture that has shaped the capital you see today - warts and all, discover the lesser-known, intriguing oddities of our city, and get unique insider tips for the rest of your stay.
Sites and topics covered include:
Dublin Castle, Christchurch, Viking & Medieval Dublin, Temple Bar, fables, folklore and mythology, Trinity College, Stephen's Green, risings and rebellions, writers & rogues and so, so much more... please remember, places are limited and you must book your spot via: https://www.generationtours.com/dublin See you soon!
